title: Compiler error after unexpected powerdown

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![no_std] #![crate_name = "Operation"] #![crate_type = "rlib"] ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` ``` ### Error output ``` farbod@farbod:~/avl/Operation$ cargo test warning: constant is never used: `ConvertingGain` --> collector/src/lib.rs:11:1 | 11 | const ConvertingGain : u32 = 1000000; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default warning: field is never read: `metrics_ids` --> collector/src/lib.rs:16:5 | 16 | metrics_ids: Vec,//there are some reserved id's : 1. Time | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: constant `ConvertingGain` should have an upper case name --> collector/src/lib.rs:11:7 | 11 | const ConvertingGain : u32 = 1000000; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: convert the identifier to upper case: `CONVERTING_GAIN` | = note: `#[warn(non_upper_case_globals)]` on by default warning: 3 warnings emitted Compiling Operation v0.1.0 (/home/farbod/avl/Operation) warning: unused import: `alloc::vec` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:6:5 | 6 | use alloc::vec; | ^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default warning: unreachable pattern --> Operation/src/lib.rs:100:21 | 100 | (_, true, _) => { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unreachable_patterns)]` on by default warning: unused variable: `prv_point` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:26:50 | 26 | fn on_aquire(&self, points: &mut Vec, prv_point: &mut Point) { | ^^^^^^^^^ help: if this is intentional, prefix it with an underscore: `_prv_point` | = note: `#[warn(unused_variables)]` on by default warning: field is never read: `id` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:20:5 | 20 | id: u8, | ^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default warning: field is never read: `incremented` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:21:5 | 21 | incremented: bool, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: field is never read: `logic_type` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:22:5 | 22 | logic_type: LogicType, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: field is never read: `metric_id` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:23:5 | 23 | metric_id: u8, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: associated function is never used: `on_aquire` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:26:8 | 26 | fn on_aquire(&self, points: &mut Vec, prv_point: &mut Point) { | ^^^^^^^^^ warning: crate `Operation` should have a snake case name | = note: `#[warn(non_snake_case)]` on by default = help: convert the identifier to snake case: `operation` warning: unreachable pattern --> Operation/src/lib.rs:100:21 | 100 | (_, true, _) => { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unreachable_patterns)]` on by default warning: unused variable: `prv_point` --> Operation/src/lib.rs:26:50 | 26 | fn on_aquire(&self, points: &mut Vec, prv_point: &mut Point) { | ^^^^^^^^^ help: if this is intentional, prefix it with an underscore: `_prv_point` | = note: `#[warn(unused_variables)]` on by default warning: 9 warnings emitted warning: crate `Operation` should have a snake case name | = note: `#[warn(non_snake_case)]` on by default = help: convert the identifier to snake case: `operation` warning: function `on_aquire_check_MAX` should have a snake case name --> Operation/src/lib.rs:177:4 | 177 | fn on_aquire_check_MAX() { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: convert the identifier to snake case: `on_aquire_check_max` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for crate_hash(734c19577ca205ef-2127172149ca103c) with hash 734c19577ca205ef-2127172149ca103c', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/lib.rs:50:1 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.55.0-nightly (c7331d65b 2021-07-17) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack warning: 4 warnings emitted error: could not compile `Operation`; 5 warnings emitted ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for crate_hash(734c19577ca205ef-2127172149ca103c) with hash 734c19577ca205ef-2127172149ca103c', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/lib.rs:50:1 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.55.0-nightly (c7331d65b 2021-07-17) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack warning: 4 warnings emitted error: could not compile `Operation`; 5 warnings emitted ```
